enigma_edit.lua.data

Interface Assignable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dereferencable, Typed
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FieldReference, Reference, TileReference, Variable

    public interface Assignable
extends Dereferencable
    A reference that can be redirected by assigning a different value. This interface provides an additional method for the assignment. Any Dereferencable value, that can also be assigned to should implement this interface instead.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assign(Source value, CodeSnippet assign, Mode mode)
      Assign a new value for this non-value to reference.

      • assign

        void assign(Source value,
            CodeSnippet assign,
            Mode mode)
        Assign a new value for this non-value to reference.

        value - The new underlying value.

        mode - Mode to use the value for.
